item1: ITEM 1 - BUSINESS Emerson Electric Co. ("Emerson", "we", "us", "our" "Company”) global technology software company provides innovative solutions customers wide range end markets around world. Through its leading automation portfolio, Emerson helps process, hybrid discrete manufacturers optimize operations, protect personnel, reduce emissions achieve sustainability goals. Sales geographic destination 2025 were: Americas, 51 percent; Asia, Middle East & Africa, 30 percent (China, 10 percent); Europe, 19 percent Portfolio management integral component Emerson's growth value creation strategy.
